mapper.select: select id, stop_check, route_code, route_name, charge_people, phone, dept_id, dept_name, user_name, user_id, remarks, create_time, update_time from inspection_route where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into inspection_route(route_code, route_name, charge_people, phone, dept_id, dept_name, user_name, user_id, remarks, create_time, update_time) values (#{routeCode}, #{routeName}, #{chargePeople}, #{phone}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{remarks}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into inspection_route(route_code, route_name, charge_people, phone, dept_id, dept_name, user_name, user_id, remarks, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.routeCode}, #{entity.routeName}, #{entity.chargePeople}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into inspection_route(route_code, route_name, charge_people, phone, dept_id, dept_name, user_name, user_id, remarks, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.routeCode}, #{entity.routeName}, #{entity.chargePeople}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update route_code = values(route_code), route_name = values(route_name), charge_people = values(charge_people), phone = values(phone), dept_id = values(dept_id), dept_name = values(dept_name), user_name = values(user_name), user_id = values(user_id), remarks = values(remarks), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update inspection_route
route_code = #{routeCode},
route_name = #{routeName},
charge_people = #{chargePeople},
phone = #{phone},
dept_id = #{deptId},
stop_check = #{stopCheck},
dept_name = #{deptName},
user_name = #{userName},
user_id = #{userId},
remarks = #{remarks},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
